#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define lt 10000000
int main() {
	int i,c=3,t,n,j;
	vector<int> v(10000001);
	v[2]=1;
	v[3]=2;
	v[0]=v[1]=-1;
	for(i=4;i<=lt;i+=2)
		v[i]=-1;
	for(i=9;i<=lt;i+=6)
		v[i]=-1;
	for(i=6;i<lt;i+=6)
	{
		if(!v[i-1])
		{
			v[i-1]=c;
			c++;
			if((ll)(i-1)*(ll)(i-1)<=lt)
			{
				for(j=(i-1)*(i-1);j<=lt;j=j+2*(i-1))
					v[j]=-1;
			}
		}
		if(!v[i+1])
		{
			v[i+1]=c;
			c++;
			if((ll)(i+1)*(ll)(i+1)<=lt)
			{
				for(j=(i+1)*(i+1);j<=lt;j=j+2*(i+1))
					v[j]=-1;
			}
		}
	}
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		printf("%d\n",v[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
